title: Estádio Joaquim Morais
text:
Estádio Joaquim Morais is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Mo%C3%A7%C3%A2medes">Moçâmedes</a>, <a href="Angola">Angola</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and serves as the home of <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Petr%C3%B3leos%20do%20Namibe">Atlético Petróleos do Namibe</a>. The stadium hosted top flight Girabola matches between 2001 and 2007. The stadium holds around 3,000 people.
The stadium was renovated in 2012 under the guidance of the Moçâmedes municipality and another renovation has been planned in 2019.
The stadium is adjacent to the Moçâmedes hockey venue.
